group_1.textRight: It's fiiiine!
Because living like that is what we're@best at.
We got rid of the apartment they were@building with our wish.
We didn't give a whit about all the people@that were supposed to live there.
We adjusted our surroundings to@protect the vegetable garden.
...Isn't that riiiight?
And you even ran away from Momoko@before, didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: Please...! Momoko...@Could you tell Rena for me...?

group_1.textRight: What...?

group_1.textLeft: Please! I've made up my mind...!@[chara:101101:motion_000:cheek_2]I'm leaving the team...!

group_1.textRight: Huh...?!@Hey, wait!
Stop! Kaede!@Kae...de...
The reason that happened was because we@were slowing them down.
So we gave up and ran away...
So in short, we ran away because it was@too hard.
Don't you agree?
If talking to people is too hard,@we just keep our distance from them.
What else... Didn't that happen at the@school marathon too?
It was troublesome and we didn't want any@attention, so we didn't do our best...
If we actually tried,@we might've even won.
When we are studying, too.@We'll just give up.
The hard problems are too much trouble,@so we'll just skip to the easy ones...
...And that's fine!
Because that's just who we are!
We care about ourself,@and we hate getting hurt...
We shape our surroundings around ourself.@If it doesn't fit, just run away...
I want you to show your true self more,@just like that!
Run, run, run away.@Find a new comfy place to stay...
That's the only way we can live!
We'll do whatever we have to!@For a place where we belong!
...And then...
Remember me...
...I'm you...

group_1.narration: So take my hand,@and hold it tight...
Together...we can live freely!@If thing's go wrong, we can just run away...@...and be free again!
Run away to free yourself.@Run away to free yourself.@Run away to free yourself.@Run away to free yourself.@Run away to free yourself.
Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.@Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.@Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.

Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.@Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.@Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.@Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.@Free yourself. Free yourself. Free yourself.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah...@Good job...!
Now, just take my hand...
